meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to emphasize a superlative quality or action.
meanings.sent1: She ran the doggonedest fastest in the race.
meanings.sent2: He was the doggonedest tallest person in the room.
meanings.sent3: The doggonedest loudest snorer in the house is the cat!
meanings.sent4: Her smile shone the doggonedest brightest in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The cake was the doggonedest most delicious treat at the party.

meanings.definition: Used informally to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Doggonedest! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent3: Doggonedest, the rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The doggonedest traffic made me late for work.
meanings.sent5: Doggonedest mosquitoes always ruin our camping trips.
